name: Faith McMillan
text: Doesn't answer phone calls. Their number has a busy signal the past 4 days. I just moved to the area and can't find a bakery (locally) to make my child's birthday cake. This business really needs to post a valid phone number or plug their phone in. Thumbs down.

name: An G
text: They have one of the better tasting strawberry cupcakes I've ever had. Icing had strawberry juice that made it taste better and the cupcake had fruit bits in them. We also tried the wedding cake cupcake (basic white cake that was very moist, vanilla icing was good), the carrot cupcake (quite good) and the vanilla cupcake with chocolate icing (chocolate was delicious). Overall, the cupcakes were all moist, very tasty but had slightly too much icing vs cupcake. The takeaway box had VERY little to be desired. No self respecting cupcake shop should have a box that doesn't have cupcake holders in them. All the cakes stuck together. 5 stars if it weren't for the box.

name: Tim Lynch
text: Was driving by and my 5 year old convinced me he and his sister deserved a cupcake after seeing the sign "Best Cupcakes". So happy we stopped in. Delicious. Quality pastries.  I'm a brownie guy, and the butterscotch brownie was top quality.  You can tell it scratch made!

name: Chris Bartz
text: 100% recommend! I ordered cupcakes for a bridal shower: strawberry with cream cheese icing and traditional wedding cake. Both were delicious! Not only did they taste great, they looked amazing. The cake was moist and flavorful and the icing was yummmmmmy. Everyone loved them. The staff is so nice and accommodating. Do yourself a favor and give this bakery a try!

name: Melissa Bowles
text: The cupcakes are AMAZING. I think I’ve tried every flavor and loved them all!. The cookies are also yummy, especially the chocolate chip. The owner and staff are wonderful and very accommodating. If you haven’t tried this bakery yet you’re definitely missing out!

name: Shelia Kennedy
text: first if all, when i called the bakery, the lady who answered was rude. But i still wanted delicious bakery cupcakes, so i placed my order anyway. I called ahead of time to order BIRTHDAY cupcakes. I was told I would have 6 birthday cupcakes (as I ordered). This was the day before Halloween, which was why i called to make sure I could get birthday cupcakes. When i arrived, i was given a box of 6 HALLOWEEN cupcakes. I dtated that i wanted birthday sprinkles and was then told "well, its halloween tomorrow so were only making Halloween cupcakes". I was disappointed because i had ordered ahead and was told it would be no problem. Then i was asked if i wanted to leave a tip. Which i did, reluctently (but thats on me). So paid over $20 for cupcakes, plus a $3 tip. It was not what i ordered and honestly, the yellow cupcakes were good but the chocolate ones were not, they were dry and seemed to be old. I had been there before and received great service and delicious cupcakes but this time, was very disappointed. Overpriced, rude service, and did not get what i ordered at all.

name: leigh taylor
text: The cupcakes are delicious!

name: Rhonda Clark-Ross
text:
Thank you so much for making our gender reveal special... Your cupcakes were delicious and I appreciate you taking care of my special order on such short notice. Awesome staff, friendly and personable. Highly recommend.

Rhonda R.

name: Lene Legrone
text:
If you haven’t tried this bake shop, you are missing out. She made the most amazing Game Of Thrones cake & It looked just like the picture. Renee and her staff are very talented can’t thank you enough! One more thing
Usually when a cake looks so amazing, The cake is dry. NOT this one. It was so moist and delicious.
I don’t know how they do it.
But the next time you want a phenomenal cake that will blow your guest away, try this bake shop. You will not be disappointed!

name: ry godwin
text: It was amazing!!!! Would recommend for anyone looking for a delicious treat!!!

name: Lorraine Muscarella
text: I had a birthday cake from there and it was terrible.  The cake was soggy where the filling was.  The cake itself didn’t taste right, like it had been frozen and thawed out.  It was decorated more like a wedding cake than a birthday cake. The icing was disgusting and the cake made 3 people sick.  Would not recommend or go back to this shop.

name: Debra Morrow
text: The ownership has changed as of September 2017.  The bakery products are no longer excellent. They are not even good -- They are tolerable if one is desperate for something sweet.  I bought five items expecting the same deliciousness from the previous owner.  The products were dry and lacked quality ingredients.  Because I was expecting the same quality products, I did not look closely at what I was buying.  Had I looked closer, I would have seen that they were different.  They did not look good either.  From the previous owner, I had bought many cookies, bars, cakes, slices of cake, and cupcakes for family, friends, students, co-workers, and myself.  Every time and everything was above board.  I shall not ever visit this shop again, unless the previous owner returns.

name: Timothy Jenkins
text: My wife and I had the opportunity to try the gluten free cupcakes from Something Sweet Bake Shop.  While my wife's diet is restricted, mine is not.  These cupcakes were so delicious that I could not tell that they were gluten free.  If you are in need of gluten free cakes or cupcakes, give Renee a chance to amaze you with her recipe.

name: Josh Null (Gulf Coast Finc. Advisors)
text: Some of the best desserts I've ever had. Great friendly service! Highly recommend!

name: Gail Okelley
text:
I thought I would try these cupcakes since the sign said they are the best cupcakes in Alabama. I must say I was very disappointed after paying over $8 for 3 cupcakes. There was nothing special about them and very over priced. My son took one bite and threw the rest away. What a waste of $8.

Very disappointed

name: Matt Gallagher
text: Im visiting from Boston and bought a carrot cake cup cake it was the best cupcake I've ever had in my life. A great experience inside the shop too. 5 stars all around

name: Eva Klemann
text: My customers loved  the cakes I purchased for them at Christmas. Everyone including myself are huge fans. There is nothing in this area that compares. Try the Red Velvet!

name: Nunya
text: Vanilla cupcakes here are the greatest. The icing she uses is awesome!! It's not to sweet but Heaven with a hint of almond!!! Great Oreo cake and Lemon Bars!! I just moved to Daphne and saw this place from the restaurant across the street and decided to try her cupcakes and they are Heaven!!

name: Christine Allen
text: Everything is amazing.  The red velvet cupcakes are to die for.  I've had several specialty cakes made and can't get over how delicious they were.

name: Jane Wasden
text: Wonderful pasties & excellent customer service!

name: Kailey Gibbs
text: The yummiest cupcakes ever!

name: Family Thingz
text: The best cupcakes in my whole LIFE of eating cupcakes...the Red velvet is my favorite!

name: Dawne Tynch
text: This is  a great quaint little Bakery. It's run by a young lady and her mom and they have the best homemade lemon bars that I've ever had😃 the chocolate chip cookies are wonderful!

name: Bill Eklund
text: This bakery is worth every calorie! I just ate a snickerdoodle and it totally melted in my mouth.l have 2 cupcakes that I purchased to share with my husband and it is taking all my will power to not eat them too!

name: Alan Hudson
text:
Wow!  The Lemon Bars Are Epic !!!

These ladies are crafting the finest desserts I have ever tasted.

Thank you for the joy you bring to my house.

Alan Hudson

name: Janet Walton
text: Wonderful experience everytime we visit this shop! Everything they make is pure bliss!!

name: Susan Brown
text: Amazing customer service bought a large order for a group they provided this with professional courtesy with a smile friendly for sure I was pleased all the way around the food was A-1 thank you Sweet something bake shop!!!

name: Paul Harriman
text: Go there once a week to get treats for those I visit.  Always good and always appreciated

name: Lindanne Lewis
text: The best cakes anywhere!! ...oh! And their lemon bars are awesome! !!!

name: Jackie Rodgers
text: Everything is scrumptious!

name: Kevin Garrett (kevgr5)
text: It's good, also expensive

name: Nikki Cook
text: Amazing

name: Nikki Avritt
text: Delicious

name: Crystal
text: Great Cupcakes!

name: Hornaday quickfire
text: Wife is a big fan. Hours are not friendly to our schedule.
